goals__remit:
The Union of Professional Engineers in Finland is a trade union with about 70 000 members through its member organisations. The members are engineers, other technical experts, and engineering students.  
 
The Union of Professional Engineers in Finland supervises the benefits of engineers and other technical professionals as well as their appreciation in working life. it focuses on labour market, business, and educational policies.
